cropsloverain.configuration.title: Crops Love Rain
cropsloverain.configuration.rain_growth_: The chance describes a 1 out of x chance that a crop will grow extra each tick.
cropsloverain.configuration.use_individu:
The chance describes a 1 out of x chance that a crop will grow extra each tick.
Set to 0 to disable speed up for that crop.
cropsloverain.configuration.separate_ste: "Stem Speed" applies to melons and pumpkins. If disabled, "stem crops" follow the speed of regular crops.
cropsloverain.configuration.halt_regular:
Completely stops the vanilla growth mechanics for all supported crops.
Use to test whether plants are being grown by rain.

Does nothing if debug mode is disabled.
